Notes.Text:
This update for gstreamer fixes the following security issues:

- A crafted AVI file could have caused an invalid memory read, possibly
  causing DoS or corruption (bsc#1024051, CVE-2017-5838)

Vulnerabilities.Description: The gst_date_time_new_from_iso8601_string function in gst/gstdatetime.c in GStreamer before 1.10.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via a malformed datetime string.
